config_saved: Your settings have been saved successfuly. The application will now restart
contains_favorites: This album contains the photos you marked as Favorites. This list is private and only locally stored in the cache of your browser.
notif_email_body:
Hello,

__user__ has shared with you new pictures in the __name__ album:
__url__

Connect with this email address to view it.
pic_hidden: This photo is now hidden for non-admins
pic_starred: This photo is now in your My Favorites album
pic_unstarred: The photo has been removed from your Favorites
pic_visible: This photo is now visible in this album
plz_sign_in: Please Sign-in with your Google account to see shared albums.
up_to_date: Your version of MyPhotos is up to date.
updated: Your version of MyPhotos has been updated successfuly. The application will now restart.
